SELECT S_ID, S_CATEGORY, S_NAME, S_SCORE, S_CONTENT, BM_ID, S_LOCATE_LNG, S_LOCATE_LAT, S_PHONENUMBER, S_HASHTAG, REVIEWCOUNT, GC_NAME, DISTANCE FROM ( SELECT S.S_ID, S_CATEGORY, S_NAME, S_SCORE, S_CONTENT, BM_ID, S_LOCATE_LAT, S_LOCATE_LNG, S_PHONENUMBER, S_HASHTAG, REVIEWCOUNT, GC_NAME,
'0' as DISTANCE
ROUND(DISTANCE_WGS84(#{M_LOCATE_LAT}, #{M_LOCATE_LNG}, S_LOCATE_LAT, S_LOCATE_LNG) , 2) as DISTANCE
, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY S.S_SCORE DESC) AS ROW_NUM
, ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY REVIEWCOUNT DESC) AS ROW_NUM
FROM SHOP S INNER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS REVIEWCOUNT, INS.S_ID FROM SHOP INS INNER JOIN S_REVIEW INSR ON INS.S_ID=INSR.S_ID GROUP BY INS.S_ID UNION SELECT COUNT(*)-1 AS REVIEWCOUNT, INS.S_ID FROM SHOP INS LEFT OUTER JOIN S_REVIEW INSR ON INS.S_ID=INSR.S_ID WHERE INSR.S_ID IS NULL GROUP BY INS.S_ID )CNT ON S.S_ID = CNT.S_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT GC_ID, GC_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE G_ID=009 )CODE ON S.S_CATEGORY = CODE.GC_ID WHERE 1=1
AND (S.S_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR CODE.GC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR S.S_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR S.S_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%')
AND GC_ID = #{vo.filter} AND (S.S_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR CODE.GC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR S.S_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%' OR S.S_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%')
AND S.S_ID = #{vo.s_id}
AND S.BM_ID = #{vo.bm_id}
AND S.S_SCORE > 4
AND GC_ID = #{vo.filter} AND S.S_ID <> #{vo.s_id}
AND S.S_HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{vo.searchKeyword}||'%'
) WHERE 1=1
AND DISTANCE < 999999
AND DISTANCE < #{limit}
AND ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex} ORDER BY ROW_NUM
